title: The Big Jump
description: Back CoverMankind had finally made the Big Jump. But the first expedition to another star system returned, only one man was aboard - one man mad with pain and nearly dead from an unknown and ghastly form of radiation sickness...No one could learn what became of the rest of the crew.Arch Comyn had to find out what happened, and eventually he made the second Big Jump himself - and came face to face with the secret horror that awaited all men the outer reaches of the universe...
author: Leigh Brackett
